newsitem.title: GERMANY: Viesturs Vucins named chief of Global One.
newsitem.headline: Viesturs Vucins named chief of Global One.

text.p: Deutsche Telekom AG said it, France Telecom and Sprint Corp of the U.S. had decided to make Viesturs Vucins president and chief executive of their Global One telecommunications venture.
Telekom said in a statement Vucins would be based in Brussels and start work immediately.
"Viesturs Vucins is an exceptionally gifted manager with huge experience in telecommunications," the statement said.
Vucins was previously founder and president of Unisource/Uniworld in Europe, president of Swedish Telecom International and worked 17 years at Ericsson Fibre Optics Co .
